title: Generate Quarterly Portfolio Performance Report
description: A client requests a performance report for their portfolio for the previous quarter.

tasks.description: Identify the client and their investment account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the client's main investment portfolio.

tasks.description: Generate the standard quarterly performance report, including asset allocation, performance vs. benchmark, and major holdings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the correct report for the specified time period.

tasks.description: Send the generated report to the client's registered email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the report to the client.
